alert.note: Alert for Bryce Canyon Country; South Central Utah (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 9:44PM MST until December 28 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM MONDAY TO 8 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Bryce Canyon Country and South Central Utah. * WHEN...From 2 PM Monday to 8 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Bryce Canyon Country; South Central Utah
